venue.name: South Station Bus Terminal Gate No. 23

item.description:
OK, our new plan is to head down New York City on Saturday morning, November 19 by LUCKY STAR Bus. $15 each way! Whoever wants to join can. You may want to use your preferred mode of transportation. Any level is welcome!

 

For our lunch, we might enjoy the food culture in Flushing right from the carts of the popular street vendors. If the majority decides to eat indoors instead, we'll select Corner 28 restaurant. We can practice a mess of Chinese along the way with these very friendly locals. Afterwards, we'll head to our hotel to rest and recharge our energy cells. The Flushing night life will belong to us. 

The night range for our hotel will depend on the final head-count and negotiations with the manager. Sharing a room to save money can be considered.

 

Schedule of LUCKY STAR BUS http://www.luckystarbus.com/Schedules.aspx

Purchase Ticket http://www.luckystarbus.com/Purchase.aspx

FREE Wi-Fi on the bus !!!

 

Around 12:30 pm, Uncle AL will be already waiting to meet the Boston group at the *Lucky Star Bus' last stop in Chinatown, NYC.*

 55-59 Chrystie Street / Hester Street, Chinatown, NYC

 (One Block from Grand Street Subway Station)

 

--------

PLACES of interest in Flushing, Queens, NY

Corner 28 Restaurant http://www.bing.com/search?q=corner%2028%20restaurant%20flushing%20ny&PQ=Corner%2028&SP=5&QS=AS&SK=AS4&sc=5-9&form=IP2TSS&pc=IP2TDF

Farrington Hotel http://www.718m.com/ and http://www.bing.com/search?q=farrington%20hotel%20flushing%20ny&PQ=Farrington%20Hote%20flushing%20ny&SP=1&QS=SC&SK=&sc=1-27&form=IP2TSS&pc=IP2TDF 718-939-1212 or 718-939-9888

Karaoke @ 7 pm Sky Blue, 136-55 37th Ave., Flushing http://skybluektv.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=42&Itemid=28&lang=en

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Fans of Chinese culture & language travel to Flushing, New York
